scripts.build:local: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.local.env vite build
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.prod.env vite build
scripts.build:stage: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.stage.env vite build
scripts.dev:local: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.local.env vite dev
scripts.dev:prod: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.prod.env vite dev
scripts.dev:stage: NODE_ENV=production VITE_GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) VITE_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version env-cmd -f .env.stage.env vite dev
scripts.test: npm run test:integration && npm run test:unit
scripts.upload:alpha-stage: yarn build:stage && aws-vault exec fe-dev -- aws s3 sync ./build s3://alpha-stage.fe-dev.infinitro.dev-8714d11/ && aws-vault exec fe-dev -- aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E39KM31MBO31M9 --paths '/*'
scripts.upload:alpha-prod: yarn build:prod && aws-vault exec fe-dev -- aws s3 sync ./build s3://alpha.fe-dev.infinitro.dev-855281c/ && aws-vault exec fe-dev -- aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3QQ9K34S0ZG34 --paths '/*'
scripts.upload: yarn build:stage && aws-vault exec fe-dev -- aws s3 sync ./build s3://websites-sv.fe-dev.infinitro.dev-d21369f/postauth-website/ && aws-vault exec fe-dev -- aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2JPFTQMBEFCE --paths '/*'
